name: TimelessSituation 0.1 - Spanish - English
description:
This is an isekai story in which you will play a role in which you can be the good guy or the bad guy.... At the beginning we are a person with certain social problems... who after committing suicide will start a new adventure.... .in which his main mission will be to find the clock of time to be able to have everything he wants and any woman he desires.

IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT

Good... the english language is already enabled and you can play.... I had an error when compiling.

<
